name: Wuxiaworld - Sepiatone
description: A darkened theme for Wuxiaworld--uses softened sepia tone colors inspired by ebook readers.
additional_info:
The style only works with the "day mode" option on the website, the "night mode" will override the custom CSS.

* Version 1.1
** Fixed issue with widget font (not correct)
** Switched to no custom font (for auto updating)
* Version 1.0
